author: Samsung
description:
This short video showcases Why Samsung Home Appliances stand out, focusing on Bespoke AI. The smart home experience powered by Bespoke AI enhances product functions and performance, bringing effortless refinement to your daily life. With it, you’ll enjoy more than just convenience—it intelligently boosts the core capabilities of our appliances, making everyday tasks smoother and more efficient for you.

 Learn more: www.samsung.com/WhySamsungHA

 #WhySamsung #BespokeAI #Samsung
title: Why Samsung Home Appliances | Bespoke AI

author: Samsung
description:
This short video showcases Why Samsung Home Appliances stand out, focusing on Knox Security. Powered by Knox, Knox Vault, and Knox Matrix, it ensures robust protection and peace of mind. With triple-layered Knox Security, your smart home experience is both secure and seamless, offering complete smart protection that enhances your daily life.

#KnoxSecurity #WhySamsung #BespokeAI #Samsung
title: Why Samsung Home Appliances | Knox Security

author: Samsung
description:
This short video showcases Why Samsung Home Appliances stand out, focusing on reliability. Built to withstand extreme testing, Samsung Home appliances also provide 7 years of software updates, industry-leading warranty, and Home Appliance Remote Management, ensuring durability and peace of mind.

author: Samsung
description: This is the official unboxing video of Galaxy XR. Curious to see how Galaxy XR looks in real life? Galaxy XR sets a new standard in spatial computing—designed for anyone looking for an ultra-immersive experience ✨ It comes in a single size that offers a personalized and comfortable fit for all users. The sleek finish in Silver Shadow completes the experience with a premium touch 😎 Weighing just 543g, Galaxy XR is incredibly lightweight, perfect for extended use. Enjoy stunning visuals on a 4K micro-OLED display that delivers an immersive experience anytime, anywhere. With spatial audio speakers, you’ll be surrounded by rich, 360° sound that pulls you deeper into the action. Galaxy XR is also equipped with high quality eye tracking and world-facing cameras, giving you smooth, intuitive multimodal control, remote-free 👀🖐 Enjoy real-time views of the world around you, all powered by the next-gen Qualcomm Snapdragon® XR2+ Gen 2 that delivers breakthrough performance and spatial immersion
title: Unboxing Galaxy XR | Samsung

author: Samsung
description:
This is the official video guide on how to work across Galaxy devices on Galaxy XR. Want to boost productivity? With Galaxy XR, you can connect your Galaxy Book to share your PC screen for smoother multi-tasking, and even take phone calls directly in XR—all without breaking your flow. It's perfect for remote workers, students, presenters, or anyone who wants to stay productive in any space—whether you’re managing tasks, attending meetings, or simply working hands-free. Learn more: http://smsng.co/XR_Multi-Task_yt

00:00 Intro
00:11 Connecting Galaxy Book to Galaxy XR
01:00 Answering Galaxy smartphone calls on Galaxy XR

Follow these simple steps to use screen share on Galaxy XR:
Step 1: Check your setup. Make sure Galaxy XR and Galaxy Book are logged into the same Samsung account, with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth turned on. Your Galaxy Book should also have the Multi Control and Second Screen apps installed.
Step 2: Connect with 'PC Link'. In Galaxy XR settings, go to 'Connected devices' → 'P
title: How to work across Galaxy devices | Galaxy XR | Samsung

author: Samsung
description:
This is the official video guide on how to use Controllers with Galaxy XR. Want to elevate the way you play games? 🎮 Controllers let you dive deeper into the action on Galaxy XR. They’re ideal for users who want more precise interactions in an immersive space—whether for enhanced gaming, smoother productivity, or simply to feel every moment of the experience. Learn more: http://smsng.co/XR_Controllers_yt

00:00 Intro
00:09 Get started with Controllers basics
00:59 Pair the Controllers
02:05 Learn how the buttons work 

📝 Follow these easy steps to set up and use Controllers with Galaxy XR:
Step 1: Turn on the Controllers. Remove the batteries, take out the strip, and reinsert the batteries to power them on.
Step 2: Add Controllers in Galaxy XR. Put on your Galaxy XR headset, go to Settings → Input, and select 'Add Controllers'.
Step 3: Pair the Controllers. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete pairing.
Step 4: Learn the button functions. Test the Primary buttons, Secondary bu
title: How to use Controllers | Galaxy XR | Samsung

author: Samsung
description:
This is the official video guide on how to adjust the fit of your Galaxy XR. Having trouble getting the right fit? 😵‍💫 Don’t worry—there are three simple ways to make Galaxy XR feel more comfortable, so you can stay fully immersed in your own reality ✨ Learn more: http://smsng.co/XR_Comfortable-Fit_yt

00:00 Intro
00:09 Using Cushion size adjusters
00:49 Block outside light with Light shields
01:15 Using Prescription lenses for low-vision users

Use these easy solutions to find your perfect fit:
1. Cushion size adjusters: If the distance between your eyes and the lenses feels too close or too far, choose from two options (Slim or Thick) to find your perfect fit. They're ideal for users who want a customized fit and comfort during extended XR sessions.
2. Light shields: If external light interrupts your immersion, attach the Light shields to enhance the Galaxy XR experience. They're recommended for anyone using Galaxy XR in bright rooms or near windows who wants deeper focus and fewer
title: How to get a comfortable fit | Galaxy XR | Samsung

author: Samsung
description:
This is the official video guide on how to get started with Galaxy XR. Are you ready to get fully immersed with Galaxy XR? 🌌 Before you begin, make sure the Battery pack is connected—Galaxy XR won’t function without it. If you want to use Galaxy XR more efficiently, this guide will walk you through the basics: how to use the three physical buttons, how to navigate with intuitive gestures, and how to use Google Gemini on Galaxy XR. With buttons, gestures, and AI, you can explore your XR space with more control and freedom than ever before 🚀 Learn more: http://smsng.co/XR_Basic-Functions_yt

00:00 Intro
00:11 Connect and disconnect the Power cable
00:33 Learn the basic buttons
01:16 Using essential gestures

Here are some easy ways to start using Galaxy XR:
1. Connect the Battery pack: Slide the Power cable down into the side Power connector until it clicks securely. It's essential for powering on Galaxy XR and ensures uninterrupted use compared to wireless-only devices.

Step 1: Activate Gemini. Press and hold the top button on your Galaxy XR headset or say "Hey Google."

Step 3: Activate Passthrough mode. Double-tap the touchpad on the right side of your

Q: Can I watch YouTube and talk to Gemini at the same time?
A: Yes! Activate Gemini while watching to ask questions about the video without pausing or closing it.
Q: Can I use multiple features at once (like watching YouTube while having Maps open)?
A: Yes! Multi-window support lets you open and use multiple apps simultaneously.
